sentences.english: Does a spring send forth fresh water and bitter from the same opening?
sentences.chinese: 泉源從一個眼裏能發出甜苦兩樣的水麼？

sentences.english: Jas. 3:11 Does the spring, out of the same opening, gush forth the sweet and the bitter?
sentences.chinese: 雅三11泉源從同一個眼裏能湧出甜水和苦水麼？

sentences.english: An unthankful Christian is a defeated Christian for he has lost his joy.
sentences.chinese: 一顆感恩的心是基督徒其他所有美德的泉源。

sentences.english: As they pass through the Valley of Baca, they make it a place of springs;
sentences.chinese: 他們經過流淚谷，叫這谷變爲泉源之地。

sentences.english: We never know where God hides His pools.
sentences.chinese: 我們不知道神把泉源藏在什麼地方。

sentences.english: Too often we miss beautiful sources of inspiration, because we’re too busy thinking about other things.
sentences.chinese: 由於忙於思考或其他瑣事，我們經常錯失靈感的泉源。

sentences.english: A fountain will flow out of the LORD'S house and will water the valley of acacias .
sentences.chinese: 必有泉源從耶和華的殿中流出來，滋潤什亭谷。

sentences.english: I am water rushing to the wellhead.
The fear of the Lord is a fountain of life, to decline from the ruin of death.
sentences.chinese: 敬畏上主，是生命的泉源，使人脫免死亡的羅網。

sentences.english: Jesus is the only one resource of contenting the thirst of soul.
sentences.chinese: 耶穌是滿足靈魂飢渴的唯一泉源。

sentences.english: Emotion provides source and motive power for people's emotional need.
sentences.chinese: 情感爲人提供了道德需要的泉源與動力支撐。

sentences.english: He makes springs pour water into the ravines; it flows between the mountains.
sentences.chinese: 耶和華使泉源湧在山谷，流在山間。

sentences.english: Therein lies the true mainspring of the experiment.
sentences.chinese: 試驗的真正的主要泉源就在此。

sentences.english: Therefore with joy shall ye draw water out of the wells of salvation.
sentences.chinese: 所以你們必從救恩的泉源歡然取水。

sentences.english: Indeed, the water I give him will become in him a spring of water welling up to eternal life.
sentences.chinese: 我所賜的水要在他裏頭成爲泉源，直湧到永生。

sentences.english: Doth a fountain send forth at the same place sweet water and bitter?
sentences.chinese: 泉源從一個眼裏能發出甜苦兩樣的水麼。

definition: to well up/to spill out (of water from a spring)
Ganquan county in Yan'an 延安[Yan2 an1], Shaanxi
copious/plentiful (of water)/surging (of waves)/refers to home village of first Han emperor 漢高祖|汉高祖[Han4 Gao1 zu3]/fig. majestic
to flow at great speed/to pour/racing current

pinyin: qu3 zhi1 bu4 jin4 , yong4 zhi1 bu4 jie2

definition: (third person pronoun for a divine being)
to drink water by scooping it up with both hands
